transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ya Manisha se Shahnawaz bol raha hun.

Executive: Haan ji. Main wohi puch raha tha aapko iske liye nahi main badhiya hun aap kaise ho?

Executive: Badhiya sir, bataiye sir.

Customer: Nahi iske liye phone kiya tha ye aap ek bar dekhiye na mere ko lead sare jo bhi aa rahe hain woh Chennai, Mumbai ke aa rahe hain jisme maine consume bhi nahi kiya uske lead.

Executive: Okay. To majorly sare ke sare jo leads aa rahe hain mere ko recommendations aa rahe hain sare Chennai ya Bombay matlab Andhra side ka jo mera region hai uska aa hi nahi raha hai.

Customer: To fir aap isko woh dekhiye thoda woh karke na change range.

Executive: Ek second rukega sir main dekh le raha hun kya dikkat aa rahi hai. Aur ye sir mera number aapne personal number save nahi kiya hai sir?

Customer: Ek bar personal number wapas bataiye.

Executive: 8829

Customer: 8839

Executive: 8829 sir.

Customer: Haan 8829 50

Executive: 50 300

Customer: 300 theek hai.

Executive: Ye number pe hi ab aage se aapko koi bhi agar service mein dikkat aayegi aap direct call kar lijiyega sir kyunki ye customer care number pe call ja rahi thi isliye maine attempt bhi nahi kar paya sir mere ko samajh hi nahi aa raha tha kaun se customer call kar rahe hain aur ticket bhi raise ho gayi hai sir.

Customer: Okay okay okay.

Executive: Kyunki isme woh DID number se call aata hai na sir alternate ek common number hota hai usse call aa raha tha mere ko aapne customer ke wahan se divert hoke mere pass aa raha tha. To that's why nahi to main pehle hi call main attempt kar leta sir. Abhi aapki leads ki problems ki main dekh leta hun sir.

Executive: Same number pe mera whatsapp bhi aap connected honge sir maybe.

Customer: Haan theek hai main aapko whatsapp pe bhi drop kar dunga.

Executive: Ye abhi teen aapke locations mein agar main aapka locations ye Andhra Pradesh hai na sir?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To main agar aapke tab agar open kar raha hun sir to isme mere ko ice box ki Andhra Pradesh ki leads dikh rahi hai.

Customer: Haan ek hai.

Executive: Aur haan uske niche fir mere ko green plastic vegetable carrot ki dikh rahi hai aapko show ho rahi hai sir ye wali?

Customer: Haan woh aa rahi hai woh Odisha mein hogi na crate ki.

Executive: Eh ki nahi sir ye bhi aapki Andhra Pradesh ki hai sir.

Customer: Oye Andhra Pradesh mein bhi aur ki aa rahi hogi.

Executive: Aap ek second check kijiyega apna tab open kijiyega sir.

Customer: Haan woh Guntur ki aa rahi hai aapko.

Executive: Ye Tenali karke koi jagah hai sir Tenali Tenali karke jagah haan wahan ki aa rahi hai aur uske baad Tenali ki ek chair ki bhi lead aayi hui hai sir.

Customer: Haan. Fir uske baad niche dekhte jaiye Chennai, Mumbai, Bhubaneshwar theek Bhubaneshwar to theek hai.

Executive: Fir matlab woh jo notification aata hai na Chennai, Mumbai ke jyada aa rahe hain.

Executive: Achcha notifications wagera jo aa raha sare Chennai, Mumbai ke aa rahe hain.

Customer: Abhi to Chennai Mumbai mein aap bilkul hi deal nahi kar rahe hain na sir?

Executive: Nahi nahi majority deal kar nahi raha hun main.

Executive: Okay okay. To aisa kijiyega ki jyada nahi aap ek do locations ki kam se kam jaise agar Mumbai ki koi leads aayi aapko side mein ek not relevant ka box dikh raha hai sir? Dustbin ka box bana hoga not relevant likha hua.

Customer: Dustbin mein karke maine dala ki I do not deal in Mumbai.

Executive: Achcha aapne dal diya. To ye sir matlab do teen matlab daily ek do buyleads ka Mumbai ka ho gaya ya fir aapka Odisha ka ho gaya jaise aap Odisha mein nahi deal kar rahe hain to ek do feedback wagera aap bhi daily ek hi do dijiyega usse jyada mat dijiyega sir. Ek do feedback aap do teen din tak regular dijiyega to ye leads aani band hogi aur main apne side se bhi isko update kar raha hun sir ki aapki jo locations wagera hai mainly aap Andhra Pradesh mein deal karte hain to agar main bhi update kar dunga sir aur aap bhi ek do feedback de denge to ye aapko different locations ki leads aani kam ho jayengi aur jo Andhra Pradesh ki hogi uski leads wagera jyada aayengi.

Executive: Achcha maine ye sabse pehle yahi check kiya sir ki aapko Andhra Pradesh ki leads aa rahi hain ki nahi aa rahi hain uske regarding hi check kiya to woh to aa rahi hain sir aapko Andhra Pradesh ki leads. Ab isme main aur kaise enhance kar sakta hun us pe kaam karta hun sir.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Jaise buyers ke side se jo calls wagera aa rahi hain sir aapko woh bhi different different location se aa rahi hongi right sir?

Customer: Woh bhi majorly Andhra se hi hai.

Executive: Mainly Andhra se hi aa rahi hai to usme kaisa aapko response wagera mil raha hai sir?

Customer: Theek thak hi hai response matlab kabhi rehta hai kabhi matlab demand rehta hai fir kabhi niche rehta hai nahi hai demand.

Executive: Hmm to matlab response in the sense ki sir customer se connect ho jata hoga obviously but matlab conversion wagera kaisa aa raha hai sir business convert wagera kar pa rahe hain sahi se conversion wagera ki rate kya hai sir?

Customer: Kyunki calls wagera mein conversion sahi aata hai sir.

Executive: 3:10 hai sir 10 customer se baat karunga agar teen log hi lenge ya do log hi lenge.

Executive: Sir buyleads mein to hota hai mainly main buyleads ka ratio to 2:2 ya 3:10 hota hai but calls mein maybe shayad thoda jyada aa rahi hogi kyunki call ka ratio agar main kisi bhi customer se baat karta hun to woh 4:10 ka ratio rehta hai sir. Ab ho sakta hai ki aapko thodi kam aa rahi ho kyunki business starting time pe hai that's why.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Kyunki buyers wagera sir puri details check karte hain kisi bhi sellers ki puri details pehle janne ke baad aur cheeze karne ke baad hi finalize karte hain deal wagera sir.

Customer: Haan wohi wohi wohi.

Executive: To main is cheez ko bhi jo aapko leads wagera jo different locations ki aa rahi hai isko bhi main dekh kar ke close ye karta hun sir aur aapka ek ticket raise ho gaya hai kyunki aapne customer care number pe call kar diya tha to woh ticket ko pehle is pe kaam kar lunga jo aapki problem hai uske baad main usko close kar dunga sir.

Customer: Theek hai sir.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai dhanyavad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving leads from Chennai and Mumbai.

- Wants leads from Andhra Pradesh region.

- Personal number not saved by the executive.



Resolution:

- Executive saved customer's personal number.

- Executive will update the location preferences.

- Customer to provide feedback on irrelevant leads.

- Executive will work on the raised ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the ticket after resolution.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, subscription, customer care, feedback
